briefdescription.para: Selects an axis for transformation if within array rank.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the axis to select.

briefdescription.para: Executes an operation in-place using input argument.

simplesect.para: True if execution is successful, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Initializes in-place operation using input argument.

parameterdescription.para: Input argument of type XArgType* for initialization.
